sources.title: King of the Wild (1931) BORIS KARLOFFüçï12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Walter Miler, Boris Karloff, Arthur McLaglen
Director: Richard Thorpe

An American visiting India learns he bears an uncanny resemblance to the country's Rajah, a resemblance which soon turns his life upside down.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:51       CHAPTER 1:  Man Eaters 
33:29     CHAPTER 2:  Tiger of Destiny
50:38     CHAPTER 3:  The Avenging Horde
1:06:52  CHAPTER 4:  The Secret of the Volcano
1:21:58  CHAPTER 5:  The Pit of Peril
1:39:18  CHAPTER 6:  The Creeping Doom
1:57:46  CHAPTER 7:  Sealed Lips
2:15:53  CHAPTER 8:  The Jaws of the Jungle 
2:33:07  CHAPTER 9:  The Door of Dread  
2:49:27  CHAPTER 10:  The Leopard's Lair
3:02:47  CHAPTER 11:  The Fire of the Gods
3:20:17  CHAPTER 12:  Jungle Justice
3:38:17 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Because American soldier-of-fortune Richard Grant is falsely accused in the murder of an Indian nobleman, he disguises himself as an Arab goes to sub Saharan Africa in search of a valuable diamond field. Along the way he meets beautiful Muriel Armitage and searches for her missing brother, Tom, supposedly murdered by the seductive femme fatale Mrs. LaSalle, who's murdered herself. An ocean liner carrying all the principals and the villainous big game hunter Harris catches fire and founders although his cargo of deadly big cats escape to the mainland. Harris is aided by Mustapha, his sinister Arab accomplice and Bimi the Ape Man, a ghastly missing link who obeys his evil master's every command.
metadata.Actors: Walter Miller, Nora Lane, Tom Santschi
